name: test_e2e_with_logs[113_SQLI_TIME_018]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_TIME_018` |
| **Name** | SQL Server WAITFOR TIME |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | time_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `WAITFOR TIME '00:00:05'`
- **Encoded**: `WAITFOR%20TIME%20'00%3A00%3A05'`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
